title: Dot Hill Invites Attendees of IBC 2015 to Learn How to Accelerate 4K Workflows With Intelligent Storage Systems
text:
Learning & Support Dot Hill Invites Attendees of IBC 2015 to Learn How to Accelerate 4K Workflows With Intelligent Storage Systems Exhibit and Demos to Show How AssuredSAN Hybrid Arrays Best Meet Streaming Performance and Availability Needs of the Media and Entertainment Industry September 08, 2015 11:32 ET | Source: Dot Hill Systems Corporation 
LONGMONT, Colo., Sept. 8,   Dot Hill Systems Corp . (Nasdaq: HILL ), the real-time hybrid storage company, today announced it is a sponsor of the IBC Conference, September 10-14 in Amsterdam. Dot Hill will be exhibiting its enterprise-class AssuredSAN ® hybrid arrays, featuring its RealStor™ real-time operating system. Attendees are invited to visit Hall 6-A16 to learn how these low-cost, high-performance reliable systems can support the broadcast, digital archiving and digital asset management challenges of the media and entertainment (M&E) industry especially with 4K workflows. WHY: Dot Hill is prevalent throughout the media and entertainment industry through OEM partners such as Quantum Corporation, Autodesk, Imagine Communications, Concurrent, and Rhode & Schwartz who provide solutions for M&E applications and professionals. Dot Hill provides low-cost, high-performance and reliable storage solutions that meet the unique HD and 4K editing needs of the media and entertainment market. Offering a combination of fast, reliable storage, which integrates easily into post-production environments for advanced collaboration with blazing speed and full support for Mac OS X, Windows and Linux environments, Dot Hill AssuredSAN solutions offer extreme performance and reliability. Quantum has partnered with Dot Hill on an extensive storage portfolio under the QXS brand. Quantum will be exhibiting end-to-end high resolution workflow solutions, powered by StorNext 5, at Hall 7, Stand B. 26. WHAT: Dot Hill will conduct demos of two popular post-production editing workflow solutions that run on DotHill's AssuredSAN 4004 controller model with 16Gb Fibre Channel connectivity to hosts and RealStream™ software, enabling multiple streams of simultaneous 4K content. RealStream is part of the RealStor real-time storage operating system and provides high performance and Five 9's availability and reliability.
